column5: 1930'S upstairs two bedroom stone charm (spacious, 1300sqft) with WIFI in desirable historic neighborhood nestled in City Center. Restaurants, shops, Trinity U. within walking distance. Short drive to Dtwn/River Walk, Zoo, Quarry, Fort Sam, Pearl, King Williams. Note-BALCONY not included in price-No access.   Recent description from one of our guests \
